{"id":1255689705,"question_id":3383,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1715481897,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1255689705/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Taking Maximum Energy From the Mystic Dungeon","memory":"60.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maximumEnergy(int[] energy, int k) {\n        int n = energy.length;\n        if(n == 0)\n            return 0;\n        \n        int dp[] = new int[n+1];\n        dp[n-1] = energy[n - 1];\n\n        int ans = Integer.MIN_VALUE;\n\n        for (int i= n-2; i >= 0; i--) {\n            dp[i] = energy[i];\n            if (i+k < n) {\n                dp[i] += dp[i+k];\n            }\n        }\n\n        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {\n            ans = Math.max(dp[i], ans);\n        }\n        \n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"taking-maximum-energy-from-the-mystic-dungeon","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
